text: “Nena (iwe Muhammad {s.a.w} kwa Ayuda ndi Akhrisitu): “Ha! Mukutsutsana nafe za Allah (ponena kuti bwanji wapereka uneneri kumbali ya ife), pomwe Iye ndi Mbuye wathu ndiponso Mbuye wanu? (Pamene mudali olungama adakupatsani uneneri, ndipo pamene mudakhota adakulandani natipatsa ife). Ife tili ndi zochita zathu; inunso muli ndi zochita zanu, ndipo ife tikudzipereka kwathunthu kwa Iye (Allah).”
